meanings: (일·사건에 대한) celebration; (사람에 대한) congratulation, celebrate, congratulate
congratulate from the bottom of one's heart

vlive.korean: 생일 축하합니다~ Happy birthday to you~ 듣기 View video ASTRO : 엠췌이 먹방이래요✌️
100일 축하해! Happy 100 day anniversary! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CRAVITY] 🎉훈훈말랑 우리비티 100일 기념 관찰일기 발표회🗒🔍 (CRAVITY’s member observation diary)
안녕~ 생일 축하 고마워요~ Bye! Thanks for the birthday wishes. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🐯🎂💖✌️
vlive.english: Bye! Thanks for the birthday wishes.

vlive.korean: 어? 멤버 중에 누가 제일 먼저 축하를 해줬지? Which member wished me a happy birthday first? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] HAPPY BAEKHO DAY🐯💖
vlive.english: Which member wished me a happy birthday first?

vlive.korean: 와~ 생일 아직도 너무 많이 축하를 해주시네요! Wow, many of you are still sending me birthday wishes!! 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🐯🎂💖✌️
vlive.english: Wow, many of you are still sending me birthday wishes!!

examples.korean: lavish gifts / costumes / celebrations 발음듣기 풍성한 선물/호화로운 복장/풍성한 축하 행사 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a ticker-tape parade in the streets of New York 발음듣기 뉴욕 거리에서 색종이 테이프를 뿌리며 하는 축하 행진 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a ticker-tape parade in the streets of New York 발음

examples.korean: ‘Congratulations!’ he said, slapping me on the back. 발음듣기 “축하해!” 그가 내 등을 철썩 때리며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Congratulations!’ he said, slapping me on the back. 발음

examples.korean: He cut a little celebratory caper in the middle of the road. 발음듣기 그가 길 한가운데서 축하 춤을 추듯 깡충거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He cut a little celebratory caper in the middle of the road. 발음

examples.korean: The cake had ‘Happy Birthday’ piped on it. 발음듣기 그 케이크에는 (가느다란 선으로) ‘생일 축하합니다’라고 씌어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cake had ‘Happy Birthday’ piped on it. 발음
